tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_performance_data (
    vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    speed FLOAT,
    acceleration FLOAT,
    fuel_consumption FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE VehicleData (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  speed FLOAT,
  acceleration FLOAT,
  fuel_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT REFERENCES VehicleData(vehicle_id),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  engine_temperature FLOAT,
  tire_pressure FLOAT,
  battery_voltage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_name VARCHAR(50),
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    manufacture_date DATE,
    mileage INT
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_performance_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    speed INT,
    fuel_consumption DECIMAL(5,2),
    engine_temperature DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_location_data (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    latitude DECIMAL(10,6),
    longitude DECIMAL(10,6)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_data (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  engine_temp FLOAT,
  fuel_level FLOAT,
  speed INT,
  location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  mechanic_name VARCHAR(100),
  notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE trip_data (
  trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  trip_distance FLOAT,
  start_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  end_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE driver_data (
  driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_name VARCHAR(100),
  license_number VARCHAR(20),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15),
  email VARCHAR(255)
);
CREATE TABLE VehicleData (   vehicle_id INT,   timestamp TIMESTAMP,   speed INT,   mileage INT,   rpm INT );
CREATE TABLE LocationData (   location_id INT,   vehicle_id INT,   timestamp TIMESTAMP,   latitude DECIMAL,   longitude DECIMAL );
CREATE TABLE EngineData (   engine_id INT,   vehicle_id INT,   timestamp TIMESTAMP,   temperature DECIMAL,   fuel_level DECIMAL );
CREATE TABLE DiagnosticData (   diagnostic_id INT,   vehicle_id INT,   timestamp TIMESTAMP,   error_code INT,   error_description TEXT );
CREATE TABLE DriverData (   driver_id INT,   vehicle_id INT,   timestamp TIMESTAMP,   driver_name VARCHAR,   driver_license VARCHAR );
